ruby-class-code.code: module HK def self.parse_DA(doc) res = {} if doc['text'] =~ /(\d+)\s*(#{Dates::FrenchMonthRE})\s*(\d+)/ year = $3 res['date'] = Time.local(year.to_i, Dates::parse_french_month($2),$1.to_i) res['year'] = Time.local(year.to_i - 1) end if doc['text-layout'] =~ /Droit\s+net.*#{year}\s+(\d+)\.(\d+)\s*e/s res['amount'] = $1.to_i * 100 + $2.to_i end return res end end
